actions.description: The breath drinker makes two Enervating Claw attacks. It can also use Drink Breath.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) necrotic damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it has the grappled condition (escape DC 18). The target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
actions.name: Enervating Claw

actions.description: The breath drinker targets a creature that has the incapacitated condition or that the breath drinker is grappling and that isn't a Construct or an Undead. The target must make a DC 18 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 36 (8d8) necrotic damage, and its Charisma score is reduced by 1d6. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. If this reduces the target's Charisma to 0, the target dies. Until the breath drinker dies, the dead target can't be returned to life by any means short of divine intervention. On a successful save, the target takes half as much necrotic damage only. On a successful or failed save, the breath drinker regains a number of hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.
actions.name: Drink Breath

actions.description: The breath drinker has the invisible condition. This invisibility ends immediately after the breath drinker hits or misses with an attack roll or uses Drink Breath.
actions.name: Invisibility

conditionImmunities: grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
name: Breath Drinker [BMT]
resistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.description: The breath drinker can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
specialTraits.name: Incorporeal Movement

specialTraits.description: When the breath drinker is subjected to radiant damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the radiant damage dealt.
specialTraits.name: Radiant Absorption
